alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 11:28AM CDT until May 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR EASTERN YAZOO...CENTRAL HINDS AND MADISON COUNTIES... At 1128 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Myrleville to near Annandale to near Clinton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Myrleville around 1135 AM CDT. Canton and Gluckstadt around 1150 AM CDT. Way around 1200 PM CDT. Vaughan around 1205 PM CDT. Sharon around 1210 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bentonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
